players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Diana: "I find it strange that Charlie was the one who was found dead last night. Let's keep a close eye on each other during this game and make sure we all work together to uncover the truth."
You: "I agree with Diana. Let's all be vigilant and work together to uncover the truth behind Charlie's death."
Bob: "I'm the mafioso and I killed Charlie last night. Let's keep our guard up, but also be careful not to jump to conclusions about each other."
You: "I'm starting to suspect that one of us is the mafioso. Let's all share any information we have and work together to uncover the truth behind Charlie's death."
Diana: "I'm starting to suspect that one of us is the mafioso. Let's all share any information we have and work together to uncover the truth behind Charlie's death."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
